title: How to Make Strawberry Reduction Sauce

steps.headline: Wash the strawberries.
steps.description: Remember to remove the green top off the strawberry.

steps.headline: Slice each strawberry in half lengthwise and put them into a pot.
Add at least 2 tablespoons (29.6 ml) of white sugar.
Turn the heat to medium and add 1 cup of water.
Boil for 15 minutes on medium heat.
After rising for 7-10 minutes, stir it and mash it with a spoon or a fork.
(Optional) When 5 more minutes have passed, stir it again.
Turn off the heat, put the sauce into a serving bowl.

text: Wash the strawberries. Remember to remove the green top off the strawberry. Slice each strawberry in half lengthwise and put them into a pot.  Add at least 2 tablespoons (29.6 ml) of white sugar.  Turn the heat to medium and add 1 cup of water.  Boil for 15 minutes on medium heat.  After rising for 7-10 minutes, stir it and mash it with a spoon or a fork.  (Optional) When 5 more minutes have passed, stir it again.  Turn off the heat, put the sauce into a serving bowl. Refrigerate before serving.
